definition: to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb
branch/classifier for sticks, rods, pencils etc

sentences.english: Maleic anhydride grafted polysulfone(PSF g MAH) was prepared.
sentences.chinese: 首先合成了马来酸酐接枝改性聚砜。

sentences.english: The grafting of acrylic acid onto a polyethylene film by the pre-irradiation method was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 采用预辐射法研究了丙烯酸对聚乙烯膜的接枝反应。

sentences.english: Radiation-induced graft copolymerization is an important technologies for surface modification of polymers.
sentences.chinese: 辐射接枝是聚合物表面改性的重要方法之一。

sentences.english: FT-IR indicated that acrylic acid was grafted on alga.
sentences.chinese: IR初步表明了丙烯酸与海藻的接枝聚合作用。

sentences.english: The differences in performance of copolymer and graft copolymer with same monomer were compared.
sentences.chinese: 比较了相同单体的共聚物和接枝共聚物的性能差别。

sentences.english: String must have added plastic, tree cut can be grafted.
sentences.chinese: 弦绝有续胶，树斩可接枝。

sentences.english: The graft copolymer EPDM-g-MMA with good mechanical properties could prepared under optimum conditions.
sentences.chinese: 在适宜条件下，可以制得较好综合性能的接枝共聚物。

sentences.english: The rheological property of grafted products and PP was still a kind of non-Newtonian pseudoplastic fluid.
sentences.chinese: 并且接枝产物的流变性能与PP一样为假塑性流体。

sentences.english: The pre-gelatinization of starch had important influence on graft copolymerization.
sentences.chinese: 淀粉预糊化对接枝反应有重要影响。

sentences.english: The graft hydrophilic polymer could effectively prevent surfactant from adsorbing on the surface of micelles.
sentences.chinese: 微胶束在接枝前，被表面活性剂吸附甚至形成包围。

sentences.english: A self-consistent field theory (SCFT) for polydisperse polymers grafted to a surface was developed.
sentences.chinese: 建立了表面接枝多分散聚合物的自洽场理论。

sentences.english: This invention relates to a method for preparing colza-oil-grafted copolymerized fatting agent.
sentences.chinese: 本发明涉及菜籽油接枝共聚加脂剂的制备方法。

sentences.english: There are several reasons to transplant large numbers of grafts in each session.
sentences.chinese: 有一些理由要在每会议中移植大量的接枝。

sentences.english: The application of the graft polymer of PP is also introduced.
sentences.chinese: 并介绍聚丙烯接枝物的应用情况。

sentences.english: Acid anhydride groups are grafted onto ABS molecular chains by reaction processing.
sentences.chinese: 用反应加工的方法可在ABS分子链上接枝酸酐基团。

sentences.english: XRD results showed that the crystallinity of grafted membranes was lower than FEP.
sentences.chinese: XRD研究结果显示，接枝膜的结晶度低于FEP。

definition: cyan/cyanide radical -CN, stable triple bond with chemical properties like halogens
